title: T206 Cobb red, Old Mill, BVG 2
author: symbebekos

posts.post_title: T206 Cobb red, Old Mill, BVG 2
posts.post_content:
A nice example for the grade. The flaws: a crease on bottom left, glue residue and slight paper loss on the back. Strong eye appeal. The shine effect is a reflection of my scanner's light on the holder Beckett uses. $625 via money order or Paypal gift option; please add 2.9% for standard Paypal. 

[IMG]http://litwack.org/auctions/cobb1.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://litwack.org/auctions/cobb2.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://litwack.org/auctions/cobb3.jpg[/IMG]
